title: Skymaster Aviator Watch Face
summary: INTERACTIVE watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch.

descriptionHTML:
SKY MASTER IS NOW INTERACTIVE


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188



Model Number
DW-A12

Category
Military

Sky Master Watch Face is an Impressive watch face for all smart watches, its changing background colors and red needle makes it more appealing (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is better then Zuhanden watches it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).



it has following features

 INTERACTIVE TOUCH
 smooth/tick needles
 collection of ambient modes with unlimited colors
 custom ambient mode
 square & round watches support
 5 custom colors
 1.6 million color themes
 Mobile battery, wear battery, month, date and week days
 Short Notification Cards
 Translucent Notification
 Notification In Ambient Mode
 Dark & Light Status Bar
 Dark & Light Hotword
 Dark & Light Whole Screen


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

Features:
 INTERACTIVE TOUCH
 smooth/tick needles
 collection of ambient modes with unlimited colors
 custom ambient mode
 square & round watches support
 5 custom colors
 1.6 million color themes
 Mobile battery, wear battery, month, date and week days
 Short Notification Cards
 Translucent Notification
 Notification In Ambient Mode
 Dark & Light Status Bar
 Dark & Light Hotword
 Dark & Light Whole Screen

Configuration:
 switch needle style smooth & tick
 pick your favorite background color
 pick your favorite ambient mode
 pick your favorite ambient mode Color
 Choose B/w Short & Full Notification Cards
 Change to Translucent Notification Cards
 Turn on/off notification in ambient mode
 switch between dark & light status bar
 switch between dark & light Hotword
 Turn On/Off Dark Whole Screen Option

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Sky Master Watch Face as your watch face

Note
Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches & all the android watches...
comments: Sky master looks good! Just wish the ambient mode would show the same blue face I've picked for the main face. Either black or just a few basic choices. Great deal for the money and makes whole watch look different. Love sweeping hand. Reminds me of all my other watches. Will buy others.

Very nice but.... 1. The app keeps showing a message to install the app. IT'S ALREADY INSTALLED! 2. It would be nice if we can change or customize the Theme section with our color palette since the ones that are there, I really don't use.
Perfact Very nyc design . More custmizable .many colors choices are good for me because i change  different color everyday
